section: VI - Organisations representing local, regional and municipal authorities, other public or mixed entities, etc.
subsection: Other public or mixed entities, created by law whose purpose is to act in the public interest
goals__remit:
B:SM is an instrument of Barcelona’s council to centralise, develop and streamline several municipal activities, both directly and through affiliated companies. Its business lines are related to two main groups: mobility and leisure spaces and activities. 
Related to mobility B:SM controls and manages the following services in Barcelona: 
•    Nearly 20.000 off-street parking lots in 56 different locations, being the leading actor in car park across the city,  
•    All the regulated on-street parking (up to 60.000 metered parking spaces), in all of its varieties: resident, high-rotation, load/unload and coaches. 
•    The towing service 
•    Public loan bicycle service (Bicing), with more than 6.000 bikes and 420 park stations 
•    Two of the main bus stations: Estació del Nord (the biggest in Barcelona) and Fabra i Puig 
In leisure activities, B:SM manages several spaces across the city: Barcelona’s Zoo, Tibidabo’s Fun Fair, Fòrum, Montjuïc and Güell’s Parks, and Olympic facilities in Montjuïc (Stadium and Sant Jordi’s Arena). 
Considering all its business lines, B:SM has approximately 1.300 employees.
